target: In diesem Fallbericht werden drei Fälle von zervikofazialem NF vorgestellt.

target: Zwei der drei Patienten starben innerhalb von 48 h an einer systemischen Erkrankung mit septischem Organversagen; ein Patient wurde nach intensivmedizinischer Behandlung und Rekonstruktion der durch Debridement verursachten Gewebedefekte entlassen.
backtranslation: Two of the three patients died within 48 hours of systemic disease with septic organ failure; one patient was discharged after intensive care treatment and reconstruction of the tissue defects caused by debridement.

source: To investigate if T1 and T2 mapping is able to differentiate between diseased and healthy myocardium in patients with systemic sarcoidosis, and to compare the standard mapping measurement (measurement within the whole myocardium of the midventricular short axis slice, SAX) to a more standardized method measuring relaxation times within the midventricular septum (ConSept).

backtranslation: To investigate whether T1 and T2 mapping is able to distinguish between diseased and healthy myocardium in patients with systemic sarcoidosis and to compare the standard mapping measurement (measurement within the entire myocardium of the midventricular short axis slice, SAX) with a more standardized method for measuring relaxation times within the midventricular septum (ConSept).
